name: kooser/session
description: Securely manage and preserve session data.

suggest.paragonie/halite: If you want the ability to encrypt sessions.
suggest.kooser/directory: If you want to use the MySql Session Handler.
suggest.symfony/filesystem: If you want to use the File Session Handler.
suggest.alcaeus/mongo-php-adapter: If you want to use the MongoDB Session Handler.
suggest.ext-memcached: If you want to use the Memcached Session Handler.
suggest.ext-redis: If you want to use the Redis Session Handler.
